poem:
Title: On Corporate Indignities

Abrdn, a name, in headlines 
tossed,
people's feelings in balance lost.
Firms, unlike men who breathe,
feel not the weight of a corporate sheath.
Yet stands Abrdn, shedding human conceit,
Not a soul, but a balance sheet.
